sentences.en: Being obese and lazy is dangerous to health.
For many obese people, that is a welcome start.
sentences.cn: 对许多人来讲, 那可是个受欢迎的开端.

sentences.en: He moved his obese body on the bed with great difficulty.
sentences.cn: 他躺在床上很吃力地挪动着自己腽肭的身躯.

sentences.en: His obese figure arrayed in costly apparel.
sentences.cn: 他的肥胖的身躯穿着一身考究的服装.

sentences.en: If you are obese or overweight your health is at risk.
sentences.cn: 要是你是肥胖或超重,那么你的康健正受到威胁.

sentences.en: Obese patients are advised to change their diet.
sentences.cn: 建议肥胖病人改变饮食.

sentences.en: Obese people tend to have higher blood pressure than lean people.
sentences.cn: 胖人常常比瘦人血压高。

sentences.en: Objective : To investigate the clinical feature of obese acanthosis nigricans.
sentences.cn: 目的: 探讨肥胖性黑棘皮病的临床特点.

sentences.en: She was obese and the object of constant obnoxious teasing.
sentences.cn: 她过于肥胖,常常是可恶的戏弄瞄准的目标.

sentences.en: The old dog, obese and bald, escaped in fear.
sentences.cn: 一条肥大秃毛的老狗, 吓得急忙躲开.

sentences.en: The old man is really obese, he can't be healthy.
sentences.cn: 那个老人太胖了, 不能算是健康.

sentences.en: The old man is really obese; it can't be healthy.
sentences.cn: 那位老人确实过于肥胖了, 不能算是健康.

sentences.en: The tendency to become obese is at least in part hereditary.
sentences.cn: 发胖至少有一部分是源于遗传。

sentences.en: These proteins, they knew, are produced abundantly in the obese.
sentences.cn: 研究人员了解在肥胖者体内这些蛋白质大量产生.

sentences.en: Those over the 95 th are usually obese.

trans.tran_en: very fat in a way that is unhealthy
